title: Misaligned half-block elements and quadrant elements in builtin font
body:
Half-block elements like U2584 and quadrant elements like U259F are sometimes misaligned (the half-height part of the quadrant element is one pixel taller). From my brief testing, this seems to occur when the cell height is an odd number. I believe this issue is due to inconsistent rounding, as half-blocks seem to behave like `floor(height/2)` and quadrants like `ceil(height/2)`.

### System

OS: Linux
Version: alacritty 0.11.0-dev (ebc6922e)
Linux/BSD: X11, qtile
